entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:52 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: NE 27 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Lake Ontario. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
